thread.title: Jeremy Kyle in awe of 64-year-old glamour model who poses naked in photoshoots - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Jeremy Kyle in awe of 64-year-old glamour model who poses naked in photoshoots - Mirror Online

author: Alistair Mcgeorge
title: Jeremy Kyle in awe of 64-year-old glamour model who poses naked in photoshoots - Mirror Online
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jeremy Kyle was in awe of a 64-year-old former primary school teacher turned glamour model who is showing off her exhibitionist side. 
The daytime TV host was chatting to Annie and her husband Terry, who joked that his wife is growing old "disgracefully" as racy snaps were shown on screen - some of them too rude to be shown to viewers at home. 
Gasps could be heard from those in the studio as the pictures flashed up, and Jeremy couldn't stop playfully flirting with the saucy guest. Annie poses nude for photoshoots (Photo: ITV) Jeremy applauded her confidence (Photo: ITV) 
"I've always been happy naked," she admitted. "I'm a shocking flirt." 
The couple's relationship has been boosted by their naughtier side - and it started as Terry paid for her first photoshoot. He chatted to the couple as snaps were shown on screen (Photo: ITV) Some images were too racy for TV (Photo: ITV) 
He added: "She's getting work, yeah." 
He also explained that if he ever got uncomfortable with the photoshoots, Annie would stop. She is happy to show off her naughtier side (Photo: ITV) Terry has encouraged her confidence (Photo: ITV) 
"If it stops being enjoyable, then I'll stop," she added, admitting that she enjoys showing off her exhibitionism. 
"It ends when I've had enough. I won't do anything that I'm not comfortable doing." Like us on Facebook
